TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstrumentationClassAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: Specifies that a class provides event or instance instrumentation.

span.span: Specifies that a class provides event or instance instrumentation.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

param.span: The type of instrumentation provided by this class.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is used if this type is derived from another type that has the attribute, or if this is a top-level instrumentation class (for example, an instance or abstract class without a base class, or an event derived from **__ExtrinsicEvent**).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is used if this type is derived from another type that has the attribute, or if this is a top-level instrumentation class (for example, an instance or abstract class without a base class, or an event derived from **__ExtrinsicEvent**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: The class must contain proper member definitions for the properties of the existing WMI base class.

span.span: The class must contain proper member definitions for the properties of the existing WMI base class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstrumentationType As InstrumentationType

summary.span: Gets or sets the type of instrumentation provided by this class.

value.span: 返回枚举值，该值包含此类提供的检测的类型。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 包含值，该值指示这是否已安装的事件、 实例或抽象类。Contains an value that indicates whether this is an instrumented event, instance, or abstract class. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

public: property System::String ^ ManagedBaseClassName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

value.span: 返回值，该值包含此检测类的基类的名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 如果不是`null`，此字符串表示此类继承 CIM 架构中的 WMI 基类。If not `null`, this string indicates the WMI base class that this class inherits from in the CIM schema. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
